'''Dinner of Judgment''' is a [[Special Dish|special]] [[food]] item that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Sweet Madame]] with [[Rosaria]]. The recipe for Sweet Madame is available from the start of the game.

Dinner of Judgment restores '''30%''' of Max HP and an additional '''1,750''' HP to the selected character. Like most foods, this cannot target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].
